about_the_game:
A Mountain of One and NYX VX have launched a universe of digital immersive space, in the form of a cyber entertainment interactive VR experience.

This is not a game but a beautiful and immersive VR experience in a land like no other. You can walk through the Forest Hill’s and see a wonderful sky with multiple moons and planets. Line up the A Mountain of One Logo and listen to ‘Custards Last Stand’, the debut track from the musical album - Stars Planets Dust me.

Follow the hill down and meet another enchanted forest with fire flies, light rings and mysterious statutes until you meet a silver dome.

This is just phase 1 of the AMO1 & NYX VX collaboration, keep your eyes peeled for the next environment in this epic musical adventure.

name: A Mountain of One

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core 3GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core 4GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: NYX and AMO1 have collaborated to bring you a fantastic musical VR experience that will have you blown away by the photo-realistic scenery of an otherworldly forest. Line up the AMO1 sign at the beginning and play the debut track from AMO1 - Custards Last Stand from the album - Stars Planets Dust Me
